recommendations: CRITICAL: 105 files are critically oversized. These need immediate refactoring to maintain code quality.
Components: 69 components exceed 300 lines. Split into smaller, focused components for better reusability.
DAL: 15 DAL files exceed 500 lines. Split by operation type (queries/mutations) or by domain.
